title: Additional reference code for missions
---

In addition to the tutorial and how-to notebooks, there are several example scripts available in the ASDC Data and User Services repository:

---

<font size="4">**CERES** (Clouds and the Earth's Radiant Energy System):</font>

- [Downloading an HDF file](https://github.com/nasa/ASDC_Data_and_User_Services/blob/main/_additional_scripts/CERES_Terra/CERES.m) (MATLAB script)

<br>
<font size="4">**SAGEIII-ISS** (Stratospheric Aerosol and Gas Experiment III, mounted on the International Space Station):</font>

- [Retrieving Monthly Zonal Mean images from SAGE III-ISS' Browse Imagery Service, Quicklook](https://github.com/nasa/ASDC_Data_and_User_Services/blob/main/_additional_scripts/SAGEIII-ISS/sage_quicklook.py) (Python script)

<br>
<font size="4">**TOLNet** (Tropospheric Ozone Lidar Network):</font>

- [Comparing ozone data between DSCOVR EPIC Level-4 and TOLNet CLIM and PANDORA](https://github.com/nasa/ASDC_Data_and_User_Services/blob/main/_additional_scripts/TOLNet/DSCOVR_EPIC_L4_TrO3_vs_tolnet_clim_vs_pandora.py) (Python script)
- [Creating a TOLNet API instance](https://github.com/nasa/ASDC_Data_and_User_Services/blob/main/TOLNet/tolnet_v01.py) (Python script)
